Parameters: LayoutTransition: The LayoutTransition sending out the event.
ViewGroup: The ViewGroup on which the transition is playing.
View: The View object being affected by the transition animation.

int: The type of transition that is ending, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#APPEARING_E@, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#DISAPPEARING_E@, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#CHANGE_APPEARING_E@, or @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#CHANGE_DISAPPEARING_E@.
endTransition(android.animation.LayoutTr.Description: This event is sent to listeners when any type of transition animation ends.
endTransition(android.animation.LayoutTr.FullName: public abstract void endTransition (LayoutTransition transition, ViewGroup container, View view, int transitionType)

Parameters: LayoutTransition: The LayoutTransition sending out the event.
ViewGroup: The ViewGroup on which the transition is playing.
View: The View object being affected by the transition animation.

int: The type of transition that is beginning, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#APPEARING_E@, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#DISAPPEARING_E@, @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#CHANGE_APPEARING_E@, or @B_android#animation#LayoutTransition#CHANGE_DISAPPEARING_E@.
startTransition(android.animation.Layout.Description: This event is sent to listeners when any type of transition animation begins.
startTransition(android.animation.Layout.FullName: public abstract void startTransition (LayoutTransition transition, ViewGroup container, View view, int transitionType)

ClassDesc: This interface is used for listening to starting and ending events for transitions.
